title: ChitroYug Academy of Fine Arts
shortDescription: Comprehensive digital platform for prestigious fine arts academy
overview: ChitroYug, a prestigious fine arts academy with 12+ years of teaching excellence in Northeast India, required a modern digital presence to match their legacy. The academy, founded by renowned artists Abhi Sarkar and Mith Sarkar, needed a platform that would serve as an informational hub, course catalog, student gallery, and enrollment portal while reflecting the artistic excellence they're known for.
businessContext: The academy had been relying on traditional marketing methods and social media for student acquisition. Without a centralized digital platform, they struggled to effectively communicate their comprehensive curriculum, showcase student achievements, and streamline the enrollment process. Prospective students found it difficult to understand course structures, pricing, and the academy's credentials.
challenge: The primary challenges included: (1) Creating a professional digital presence that reflects 12+ years of artistic excellence without appearing corporate or impersonal, (2) Organizing and presenting complex course structures across multiple diploma programs with semester-wise breakdowns in an intuitive manner, (3) Building trust with prospective students through credibility indicators (ISO certification, UDYAM registration, student testimonials), (4) Designing an accessible platform for users across Northeast India with varying internet connectivity, (5) Integrating enrollment processes seamlessly without requiring backend infrastructure.
strategicApproach: Conducted stakeholder interviews with both founders to understand their vision and teaching philosophy
Analyzed competitor art academies and identified gaps in their digital experiences
Developed a content strategy prioritizing student success stories and instructor credibility
Created a mobile-first design considering the target demographic's device preferences
Designed an information architecture that guides prospective students through awareness, consideration, and enrollment stages
solution: We developed a modern, responsive website using Next.js 14, leveraging server-side rendering for optimal performance and SEO. The platform features: (1) A dynamic course catalog with detailed semester-wise curriculum breakdowns, transparent pricing, and clear learning outcomes, (2) An interactive gallery showcasing student and instructor artwork, building credibility and inspiration, (3) Comprehensive founder profiles highlighting their expertise and teaching philosophy, (4) Integration with Google Forms for seamless enrollment without requiring complex backend systems, (5) Optimized image delivery using Next.js Image component for fast loading even on slower connections, (6) Social media integration connecting to YouTube, Instagram, and Facebook for extended reach.
technicalImplementation: Built with Next.js 14 for optimal performance, SEO, and modern React features
Implemented TypeScript for type-safe development and better code maintainability
Used Tailwind CSS for responsive, consistent design system across all pages
Leveraged Next.js Image Optimization for automatic image compression and responsive images
Deployed on Vercel with automatic CI/CD pipeline and edge network distribution
Implemented accessibility best practices including semantic HTML and ARIA labels
Created reusable component architecture for CourseCard, TestimonialCard, and ContactForm
keyFeatures: Six comprehensive pages: Home, Gallery, About, Courses, Feedback, Contact
Detailed course catalog with semester-wise breakdown of two diploma programs
Interactive artwork gallery with lightbox functionality
Student testimonial section with verified reviews
Multiple contact methods: form, WhatsApp, phone, email
Credibility indicators: ISO certification, UDYAM registration displayed prominently
Responsive design optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
Fast page loads with optimized images and code splitting
results: Successfully launched within 8 weeks, meeting all stakeholder requirements
Established a professional digital presence reflecting 12+ years of artistic excellence
Streamlined enrollment process with direct Google Forms integration
Created a centralized information hub reducing repetitive inquiries by consolidating course details, pricing, and founder credentials
Improved user experience with mobile-first design serving the target demographic effectively
Enhanced credibility through strategic placement of certifications and student testimonials
Achieved excellent performance metrics with optimized Next.js architecture
Provided scalable foundation for future enhancements including payment integration and student portal
